docstring.long_description:
Inputs
------
ip_address: String
    The IP address of the robot arm.
docstring.short_description: The MOVE_LIN node linearly moves the robot's tool to an absolute Cartesian position relative to the robot's tool reference frame which is set by the SET_TRF node.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The x coordinate of the position to move to

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The y coordinate of the position to move to

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: The z coordinate of the position to move to

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: The alpha coordinate (rotation in radians about the x axis) of the position to move to.

parameters.name: beta
parameters.description: The beta coordinate   (rotation in radians about the y axis) of the position to move to.

parameters.name: gamma
parameters.description: The gamma coordinate (rotation in radians about the z axis) of the position to move to.

returns.description: The IP address of the robot arm.
